pageContext.claim: “The Democrats in Congress yesterday were vicious and totally showed their cards for everyone to see. When the Republicans had the Majority they never acted with such hatred and scorn! The Dems are trying to win an election in 2020 that they know they cannot legitimately win!”
pageContext.analysis: Acting Attorney General Matthew Whitaker's testimony before the House Judiciary Committee was filled with firey, partisan exchanges, but this style is nothing new for committees in the House of Representatives. Hillary Clinton was questioned for nearly 11 hours about her private email server ane the Benghazi attacks.
